original_title: The Adventures of Alexander Margo (and Kate Clark too, for that matter!)
overview: When Kate Clark was a kid, she had the best imaginary friend in the world, Alexander Margo, who took her on all sorts of adventures. Now in high school, Kate struggles to go on an adventure of her own, and Alex never left, so the two attempt to work together to go on their greatest adventure yet, making a movie.
title: The Adventures of Alexander Margo (and Kate Clark too, for that matter!)
